name: My GCC Dev Container
postCreateCommand: sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y software-properties-common && sudo add-apt-repository ppa:ubuntu-toolchain-r/test -y && sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y gcc-12 g++-12 && sudo update-alternatives --install /usr/bin/gcc gcc /usr/bin/gcc-12 100 && sudo update-alternatives --install /usr/bin/g++ g++ /usr/bin/g++-12 100
